title: Reduce call arg moves
description: Reduce call-argument move traffic in lowering/peephole to shrink call sequences.

title: Regalloc: swap-aware jump-arg coalescing
description: Prefer non-swap assignments for jump-arg parallel moves to avoid temp regs in loops (e.g. fib).

comments.author: Milky2018
comments.text: Implemented swap-aware jump-arg 2-cycle break in regalloc apply_allocation (scratch redirect for locally-defined jump args). Tests: moon test.

title: Call arg consts: avoid redundant fixed-reg move bounce
description: Remove def-fixed loads for register const args so regalloc doesn't emit back-and-forth moves before calls.

title: Direct-call lowering for known Wasm calls (avoid func_table indirection)
Fuse cmp+branch even when cmp is not last
description: Improve vcode fuse_cmp_branch to find cmp defs earlier in block so redundant compares and const loads are removed.

title: Fix remaining JIT WAST regressions after call optimizations
description: Investigate and fix 14 failing WAST files in JIT mode after recent call const remat and regalloc constraint fixes.

title: Direct-call Branch26 fixups for intra-module calls
description: Replace LoadFuncAddr+blr with bl + Branch26 fixups and patch at JIT load time.

title: Import calls via vmctx load
description: Use vmctx func table pointer loads (LDR + BLR) for imports instead of LoadFuncAddr.

title: Fuse cmp+branch to drop compare constants
Fix memory64 JIT regressions after peephole
description: Investigate peephole optimization removing needed add/move in vcode; memory64 endianness/grow/redundancy failing under JIT at -O2.

title: Compare wasmtime explore vs wasmoon benchmark.wat and decide next optimizations
Fix JIT regressions from const-arg remat
description: Investigate and fix JIT regressions after const-arg rematerialization; 16 wast failures incl call/imports/gc/br_on_null. Reduce to minimal repro and adjust lowering or remove optimization.

title: Peephole correctness: terminator uses + store forwarding alias
description: Harden vcode peephole: count terminator uses in in-place update optimization and conservatively clear load-store forwarding map on StorePtrNarrow to avoid overlapping store alias.

title: Regalloc: phi-move coalescing pass
description: Add a coalescing pass for jump args -> block params to eliminate redundant moves when safe across CFG.

comments.author: Milky2018
comments.text: Added single-predecessor block param coalescing in vcode peephole, guarded to skip func_table/exception users. Updated snapshots; tests: moon test.
